attributes.action: Get some sort of crossing outside Whitley Bay holiday park
attributes.additional_details: Been coming to the holiday park for years and it’s a terribly busy main road to get across with young kids, you need to cross the road to get in and off a bus n not ideal if you’ve came back shopping with lots of bags and have to cross the road with young children especially with the speed of some of the cars going past and the double decker buses
